listing.headline: 2 Bed (Type 4) – Duplex with Marina View - Gateway Al Zorah
listing.description: This 2 Bed (Type 4) – Duplex offers a stunning Marina View in the prestigious Gateway Porto Al Zorah. With a total area of 2301 sqft, this off-plan apartment is ideal for serene waterfront living. Estimated handover: December 2026. Flexible 50/50 payment plan available.
